roleset.name: snap, crackle, pop
roleset.note: CREPITATE-V NOTES: Edited by hwangd (from crepitate.01-v)
CREPITATION-N NOTES: Based on Sharp data. Comparison to crackle.01 and snap.04. Both are members o VN class sound_emission-43.2. No FN class. Framed by Katie. (from crepitation.01-n)

example.name: All args
example.text: It crepitated with resistance, and when placed in water did not sink.

example.name: This is arg 0 because joint motion causes the noise.
example.text: She has significant crepitation on both active and passive motion of the joint.
example.arg: on both active and passive motion of the joint.
